text: Les Misérables is a 1998 British German American romantic drama movie directed by Bille August and is based on the 1862 novel of the same name by Victor Hugo. It stars Geoffrey Rush, Liam Neeson, Uma Thurman, Claire Danes, Patsy Byrne, Ralph Nossek, Kathleen Byron, Hans Matheson, John McGlynn. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1998 romantic drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:German romance movies Category:German drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Bille August
title: Les Misérables (1998 movie)
